com.b2international.index.admin

Interface IndexAdmin


  • public interface IndexAdmin
    Administration interface managing an elasticsearch index.
    Since:
    4.7

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> void clear(java.lang.Class<T> type)
      Clears a type and all its associated data from the index.
      void close()
      Closes the underlying index.
      void create()
      Creates the index if and only if does not exist yet, otherwise this method is no-op.
      void delete()
      Deletes the entire index with its data if and only if does exist, otherwise this method is no-op.
      boolean exists()
      Returns true if the index already exists, otherwise returns false.
      java.lang.String getTypeIndex(DocumentMapping mapping)
      Returns the actual index name for the given DocumentMapping.
      org.slf4j.Logger log()
      Returns the Logger assigned to this index.
      Mappings mappings()
      Returns the mappings defined for this index.
      java.lang.String name()
      Returns the index name prefix which will be used to identify all indexes that managed by this IndexAdmin.
      void optimize(int maxSegments)
      Optimizes the underlying index until it has less than or equal segments than the supplied maxSegments number.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> settings()
      Returns the settings of this index.

    • Method Detail

      • log

        org.slf4j.Logger log()
        Returns the Logger assigned to this index.
        Returns:

      • exists

        boolean exists()
        Returns true if the index already exists, otherwise returns false.

      • create

        void create()
        Creates the index if and only if does not exist yet, otherwise this method is no-op. Configure the defined mappings() as well.

      • delete

        void delete()
        Deletes the entire index with its data if and only if does exist, otherwise this method is no-op.

      • clear

        <T> void clear(java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Clears a type and all its associated data from the index.
        Parameters:
        type - - the type to remove completely from the index

      • settings

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> settings()
        Returns the settings of this index.
        Returns:

      • mappings

        Mappings mappings()
        Returns the mappings defined for this index.
        Returns:

      • name

        java.lang.String name()
        Returns the index name prefix which will be used to identify all indexes that managed by this IndexAdmin.
        Returns:

      • getTypeIndex

        java.lang.String getTypeIndex(DocumentMapping mapping)
        Returns the actual index name for the given DocumentMapping.
        Parameters:
        mapping -
        Returns:

      • close

        void close()
        Closes the underlying index.

      • optimize

        void optimize(int maxSegments)
        Optimizes the underlying index until it has less than or equal segments than the supplied maxSegments number.
        Parameters:
        maxSegments - - max number of segments to force on the index
